Name: Golf For Fun
About the game: Golf for fun, is a 2D golf-based game, focused on generating challenging and entertaining players, where you can play precisely crafted maps to test your skills. The game challenges you in 100 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity. It is during the levels you will encounter obstacles.
